newsitem.title: USA: Xerox forms software development unit.
newsitem.headline: Xerox forms software development unit.

text.p: Xerox New Enterprises, a unit of Xerox Corp, Tuesday said it has formed InXight Software Inc, a software development firm.

Xerox said the launch of InXight is the final step in restructuring its XSoft software document firm into three autonomous companies, each focused on its own core business. In May, Xerox created InConcert and Chrystal, which operate independently in separate segments of the technology market. In a statement, Mohan Trikha, InXight's president said, "Our charter is to take advanced technologies in the area of natural language software and user interface research, and implement them as leadership products that bring intelligent information access capabilities to our customers' software applications."
